author: andschwa
body: Instead of using `ResourceManager` directly. Since the rest of PowerShell uses the strongly-typed auto-generated C# bindings for resources, we should be consistent and use it there too. This caused a bug while implementing #743.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Moving to GA, we updated the code to make it work, proper fix is not needed for 0.6.0

comments.author: vors
vors
comments.body:
For now, we will replace hard-coded values, where needed.
Lets revisit this issue after Aug17.

title: Use C# bindings in EventLog code
